# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(game-engine-patcher LANGUAGES CXX)

# target
add_library(game-engine-patcher SHARED "")
set_target_properties(game-engine-patcher PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "version")
set_target_properties(game-engine-patcher PROPERTIES LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
target_include_directories(game-engine-patcher PRIVATE
    include
)
target_include_directories(game-engine-patcher SYSTEM PRIVATE
    /_/git/@microsoft/vcpkg/installed/x64-linux/lib/pkgconfig/../../include
    /_/git/@microsoft/vcpkg/installed/x64-linux/include
)
target_compile_definitions(game-engine-patcher PRIVATE
    NDEBUG
    _CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS
    WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN
    WITH_LOGGING
)
target_compile_options(game-engine-patcher PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/we4668>
)
set_target_properties(game-engine-patcher PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(game-engine-patcher PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(game-engine-patcher PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-O2>)
else()
    target_compile_options(game-engine-patcher PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET game-engine-patcher PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(game-engine-patcher PRIVATE
    user32
    ws2_32
    wldap32
    crypt32
    normaliz
    advapi32
    curl
    ssl
    crypto
    dl
    z
    pugixml
)
target_link_directories(game-engine-patcher PRIVATE
    /_/git/@microsoft/vcpkg/installed/x64-linux/lib/pkgconfig/../../lib
)
target_link_options(game-engine-patcher PRIVATE
    -m64
    /LTCG
)
target_sources(game-engine-patcher PRIVATE
    src/dll_main.cc
    src/main.cc
    src/rbx/http/http_Api.cc
    src/rbx/signature/signature_Patches.cc
    src/rbx/addresses/addresses_Helper.cc
    src/rbx/url/url_Api.cc
    src/rbx/version_proxy.cc
    src/rbx/platform/platform_Wine.cc
    src/rbx/platform/platform_Patches.cc
    src/rbx/logging/logging_Api.cc
    src/rbx/logging/logging_DebugConsole.cc
)
